circumstances: Malcolm Hart was last seen leaving his university in Houston Mains, Livingston, before he disappeared. His foster mother became concerned when he didn't return home and alerted the authorities. Investigations revealed that Malcolm enjoyed frequent solitary walks through forested areas, including those surrounding his university campus. A colleague remembered seeing Malcolm in the vicinity of a forest near 4 Grange Court, North Berwick, prior to his disappearance. This information spurred a search operation, including local volunteers and friends, who combed the thick woods in search of clues. Eventually, a concerned local resident discovered Malcolm at 69-71 Whitehill Street, Musselburgh.
